tool_description: The Joke Generator API is your go-to source for endless laughter and smiles. It's a fun and interactive tool that allows developers to access and retrieve a wide variety of jokes and humor. Whether you're building a chatbot, a mobile app, or simply want to add humor to your website, this API has you covered with a never-ending supply of jokes.
name: Joke Generator API
title: Joke Generator API

api_list.name: postJoke
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://joke-generator-api.p.rapidapi.com/api/random-joke"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "joke-generator-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://joke-generator-api.p.rapidapi.com/api/random-joke"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "joke-generator-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
